author: skitching
msg: Remove old link entries from "top" navbar, for better consistency with new main site.

author: barrettj
msg: Cleanup binding type exception log from EnpdointDescription validator to make it more usable.

author: ate
msg: Fixing a very nasty bug where a (separate) finalizer thread tried to stop (again) an datasource.
This isn't needed (and definitely wanted) as this class has a proper stop() method itself which already will be called when the Spring container is stopped.

author: ate
msg: Support for using an embedded Derby database multiple times from one JVM by properly shutting it down after each (test) run
